Defines the activity selection parameters and their paths into an activity - used in the dynamic construction of the selection part of the API. The priority number indicates the order of precedence in the computed path, which is intended to put the most selective facets before the least specific, based on the counts in the cached codelist.
defines the contents of the olap cache.

Pipeline collection - tasks are executed in sequential order. Each transformation takes an iati-activity in and returns a, possibly augmented, iati-activity. It is intended that additional transformations using XQuery or XSLT would be able to be inserted into the pipeline. Currently all tasks are defined in iati-t.xqm. Tasks may have dependencies on prior tasks (eg currency conversion before computing the project value before allocation in proportion) so take care if reordering.

A log of all errors encountered in the transformation pipeline. An error here usually indicates that the assumed type of an item of data has been violated - eg a percentage which is not a number or (exceptionally ) a compile error has occurred. In the event of a pipeline error, the step is ignored and the activity passed through ,so there may be consequential errors
